metadata.title: CVE-2020-15965 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Type confusion in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 85.0.4183.121 allowed aremote attacker to potentially perform out of bounds memory access via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
